author: duanders
body:
- Add HBHE noise filter and PV filter to all skim sequences (previously were just in the MET paths)
- Add CSC tight halo filter to all skim sequences
- Tighten non-MET skim cuts to reduce hotline event rate
- Cut on isGlobalMuon() in single muon skim and cut on lepton pt in massive dilepton skims
title: Update hotline skim sequences and cuts
